dict.acceptation: 帮助，援助；〈古〉出席，出席者；辅助设备；

sent.orig: It will help managers to overview and control assistance asas understanding where the assistance comes from.
sent.trans: 这将有助于管理人员监督和控制援助以及理解的援助来自。

sent.orig: We're offering every possible assistance to them in terms of information sharing or other technical assistance.
sent.trans: 我们愿意为北京奥运提供信息共享及其它技术方面一切有可能的支持。

sent.orig: Once trained, the cows no longer require human assistance assistance, unless something goes wrong.
sent.trans: 一旦训练过，奶牛不再需要人工协助除非出现错误。

sent.orig: It also prohibits all financial assistance assistance other than for humanitarian or developmental development purposes.
sent.trans: 同时，出于人道主义和发展目的之外的所有财政援助也被禁止。

sent.orig: We will improve urban and rural medical assistance programs and improve the level of assistance.
sent.trans: 完善城乡医疗救助制度，提高救助水平。
